data.event: Dalton was first settled in 1755 and officially incorporated in 1784.
Dalton was first settled in 1755 and officially incorporated in 1784.

event.title: 1801, Zenas Crane, Henry Wiswall and John Willard set up

data.event: In 1801, Zenas Crane, Henry Wiswall and John Willard set up a paper mill along the river which, by 1844, had begun producing banknote paper, which was purchased by banks all the way to Boston.
In 1801, Zenas Crane, Henry Wiswall and John Willard set up a paper mill along the river which, by 1844, had begun producing banknote paper, which was purchased by banks all the way to Boston.

event.title: now has a mix of small town and suburban qualities, and was served

data.event: The town now has a mix of small town and suburban qualities, and was served by trolleys to Pittsfield for many years.
